Name: ISEKAI FRONTLINE
About the game: CAUTION) Currently, the game has some AI-generated images. We respect our users' opinions and have decided to remove all of these images. The removed illustrations will be replaced with hand-drawn ones. This will take some time, but we appreciate your patience. Other illustrations were created by the creator over the course of two years. The list of AI illustrations is specifically mentioned in the discussion board. You are the only 'guy' in this world. All the other guys have turned into zombies. Girls are fighting zombies with guns. Can you survive in a devastated post-apocalyptic world? Our game is a rogue-like 'HENTAI' shooting game. You can have fun with your cute partners. Also, you can capture powerful enemy bosses and dominate, can bring them to your side. But be careful. If you lose, your allies will be captured by the enemy. (Don't worry too much, if you want, you can sacrifice yourself to prevent that from happening.)
